Posts.Content: Oct 30, 2012 02:41PM HazelA wrote: Sorry I don't have any advice for you, I'm new here and came by because I've found a lump and awaiting a referral to a breast clinic.Â  What I can tell you though is that it's not crazy to be getting worked up. ((hugs)) I too am worked up and have a 2year old, thinking the worst but hoping for the best. Reading some of the stories of the ladies on here has made me realise how strong we are as women. Wishing you all the best.
